extendedInfo.description: Find around you new parties, pubs, and other events you didn't know about.Event Master links you to all the open Facebook events in your city, and by understanding popularity and removing the trash, this App is the perfect tool to find out what's going on without wasting your time. You can easily find all the hottest events for the coming week in your area, or discover popular events when traveling, at your destination.Features----------â Find new Facebook events around your current locationâ Find new Facebook events by choosing a city (perfect for traveling)â View distance to each eventâ Sort events by Popularity or Distanceâ Guys & Girls age ranges (when available)â Number of confirmed going (from Facebook)â Guys & Girls ratioâ Link to the event page on Facebookâ Notification of major eventsâ Create a sharing community between your friends (by inviting friends to join)We only show information on public events, we do NOT deal in private ones, so each event you see on Event Master was defined as an open event by its creators on Facebook (Which means everyone can see it).All the gathering and sorting is performed automatically, so there are no "special" interests, the top events ARE the most popular ones.We already have events for: New York, Los Angeles, London, Chicago, Berlin, Houston, Paris, Miami, Amsterdam and the list gets bigger every day. Includes Nightclubs, Lounges, Rooftops , Bars, Beachs, College and House parties or any other kind.

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for, Does what it says and looks great.
reviews.author: Mike Seded

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: This app provides very complete event listing and clear event information. Two thumbs UP!
reviews.author: Johnson Kim

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I can find all the interesting events around the world, very useful app.
reviews.author: Rose Mie

reviews.title: Sweet Finder
reviews.comment: Found some events that was looking up on other sites but were not able to. Event Master is really a master in finding events I actually like.  Nice job
reviews.author: Gina Zela

reviews.title: Best by far
reviews.comment: The best event finder app! I get the most localized event information available with it.
reviews.author: Thomas McClenny

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Must have app, perfect for my needs.
reviews.author: Krista Jones
